#Text=Controversy brews surrounding small Texas church
#Text=Monday , October 21 , 2013
#Text=The Church of Wells , based in the small town of Wells , Texas has been at the center of significant media activity in recent days .
#Text=Wikinews spoke with a Tyler , Texas minister who had an encounter with Church of Wells members recently .
#Text=In the media , reports have surfaced surrounding Catherine Grove , a 26 year-old Arkansas woman who recently joined the Church of Wells .
#Text=Grove 's parents and other family say they 've hardly communicated with her since July .
#Text=Grove 's parents have been in Wells since July , hoping to have a chance to speak with her directly .
#Text=A Latin Cross , a comon symbol of Christianity .
#Text=Image : Tinette .
#Text=Tyler , Texas is a city located about 70 miles north of Wells .
#Text=The Tyler minister explained to Wikinews , he and several of his church members were distributing food and water to homeless citizens in downtown
#Text=Tyler when they were accosted by members of the group .
#Text=He described the individuals as appearing " [ ... ] very robotic , kind of disengaged and had very big eyes .

#Text=When asked if he believes the Church of Wells to be a cult , the minister replied ,  The way they were yelling and the leader seemingly believed that our church member absolutely had to share his testimony aloud with him , specifically him , that 's why I can say with comfort that this group is a cult .

column1: #Text=It ended with Jesus .
#Text=Yes , there are preachers and ministers , but the prophets have ended .
#Text=' I believe the man thinks he is a prophet .
#Text="
